dct_description_sm: "Card series." Relief shown by hachures and form lines. "Entered according to Act of Congress in the year 1865 by Charles Scribner & Co. ..." Insets: Profiles from north to south -- Profiles from east to west. Wall map. Scribner, Armstrong, & Co. flourished ca. 1871-1879. cf. Tooley's dictionary of mapmakers.
dct_publisher_sm: New York : Scribner, Armstrong, & Co. [between 1871 and 1879].
